org.cytoscape.util.swing

Class TextIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cytoscape.util.swing.TextIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Icon

    public class TextIcon
extends Object
implements Icon
    Renders any text/font as an icon.
